issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
An error is logged when creating an instance:

{code}
Thu Nov 6 11:13:44 2014 ERROR [SynchronousActivityTaskPoller:SWF Activity  CloudFormationTaskList 8] [com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.execute(SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.java):207] Failure processing activity task with taskId=267, workflowGenerationId=db5743ba-ae9b-493f-88fb-e42633c58012, activity={Name: StackActivity.performCreateStep,Version: 1.0}, activityInstanceId=58
com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.ActivityFailureException: Instance i-6fd41e14 is not yet running, currently pending : eMethod":false},{"methodName":"run","fileName":"Thread.java","lineNumber":745,"className":"java.lang.Thread","nativeMethod":false}],"message":"Instance i-6fd41e14 is not yet running, currently pending","localizedMessage":"Instance i-6fd41e14 is not yet running, currently pending","suppressed":["[Ljava.lang.Throwable;",[]]}]
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.pojo.POJOActivityImplementation.throwActivityFailureException(POJOActivityImplementation.java:110)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.pojo.POJOActivityImplementation.execute(POJOActivityImplementation.java:67)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.generic.ActivityImplementationBase.execute(ActivityImplementationBase.java:46)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.execute(SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.java:196)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.ActivityTaskPoller$2.run(ActivityTaskPoller.java:92)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
{code}

The instance/stack were created successfully.
fields.summary: CloudFormation error logged when running instance

comments.body:
There is also an error when deleting a stack with an instance resource:

{code}
Mon Dec 15 11:57:59 2014 ERROR [StackActivityImpl:SWF Activity  CloudFormationTaskList 3] [com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.workflow.StackActivityImpl.performDeleteStep(StackActivityImpl.groovy):427] com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.workflow.ValidationFailedException: Instance i-a149f3dc is not yet terminated, currently shutting-down
Mon Dec 15 11:57:59 2014 ERROR [SynchronousActivityTaskPoller:SWF Activity  CloudFormationTaskList 3] [com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.execute(SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.java):207] Failure processing activity task with taskId=190, workflowGenerationId=e0a485df-8146-4bb6-aeb6-18248a7f3f66, activity={Name: StackActivity.performDeleteStep,Version: 1.0}, activityInstanceId=39
com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.ActivityFailureException: Instance i-a149f3dc is not yet terminated, currently shutting-down : ["com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.workflow.ValidationFailedException",{"cause":null,"stackTrace":[{"methodName":"perform","fileName":"AWSEC2InstanceResourceAction.java","lineNumber":472,"className":"com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.resources.standard.actions.AWSEC2InstanceResourceAction$DeleteSteps$2","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"performDeleteStep","fileName":"StackActivityImpl.groovy","lineNumber":418,"className":"com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.workflow.StackActivityImpl","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"invoke","fileName":null,"lineNumber":-1,"className":"sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor713","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"invoke","fileName":"DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java","lineNumber":43,"className":"sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"invoke","fileName":"Method.java","lineNumber":606,"className":"java.lang.reflect.Method","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"execute","fileName":"POJOActivityImplementation.java","lineNumber":64,"className":"com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.pojo.POJOActivityImplementation","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"execute","fileName":"ActivityImplementationBase.java","lineNumber":46,"className":"com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.generic.ActivityImplementationBase","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"execute","fileName":"SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.java","lineNumber":196,"className":"com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.SynchronousActivityTaskPoller","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"run","fileName":"ActivityTaskPoller.java","lineNumber":92,"className":"com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.ActivityTaskPoller$2","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"runWorker","fileName":"ThreadPoolExecutor.java","lineNumber":1145,"className":"java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"run","fileName":"ThreadPoolExecutor.java","lineNumber":615,"className":"java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"run","fileName":"Thread.java","lineNumber":745,"className":"java.lang.Thread","nativeMethod":false}],"message":"Instance i-a149f3dc is not yet terminated, currently shutting-down","localizedMessage":"Instance i-a149f3dc is not yet terminated, currently shutting-down","suppressed":["[Ljava.lang.Throwable;",[]]}]
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.pojo.POJOActivityImplementation.throwActivityFailureException(POJOActivityImplementation.java:110)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.pojo.POJOActivityImplementation.execute(POJOActivityImplementation.java:67)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.generic.ActivityImplementationBase.execute(ActivityImplementationBase.java:46)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.execute(SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.java:196)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.ActivityTaskPoller$2.run(ActivityTaskPoller.java:92)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
{code}

Changeset for review:

https://github.com/sjones4/eucalyptus/commit/6fe80d89df5ccff961de7ad488d68ee857ca2bf4

{quote}
Resource create/delete are now checked by polling the resource instead
of using retries. Actions now expose a timeout for steps rather than a
retry policy. A WorkflowUtils class is added to simpleworkflow common so
generic workflow logic can be reused.
{quote}

Not sure if the current backoff strategy on polling is appropriate, we may want to cap the polling interval to a % of the overall timeout.

Looks good, though there also needs to be a change to com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.workflow.steps.AWSCloudFormationWaitConditionCreatePromise to possibly use the new MultiStepPromise, though it has some custom code to be able to read the timeout value after properties have been read.

Fix Verified.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.1.0
Release     : 0.0.23007.344.20150115git7334b09.el6

no error logged when creating or deleting stack with an instance resource.
